title: [Medicine] CoVac-1, a multi-peptide vaccine designed to offer long-lasting immunity, has passed its first human trial. The results of the phase I clinical trial are published in Nature today.

[Medicine] Study: Aspirin is linked with increased risk of heart failure. This is the first study to report that among individuals with a least one risk factor for heart failure, those taking aspirin were more likely to subsequently develop the condition than those not using the medication.
